titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-1032, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

Resolution waives the provisions of clause 6(a) of rule XIII against resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules on December 15, 2000, providing for consideration or disposition of a conference report to accompany H.R. 4577, or any amendment reported in disagreement from a conference thereon.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 330.

bill.summary: 12/14/2000--Introduced. Waives the requirement of rule XIII (for a two-thirds vote to consider a Committee on Rules report the same day it is presented) with respect to any resolution reported on December 15, 2000, to consider or dispose of a conference report for H.R. 4577 (making FY 2001 appropriations for the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and related agencies).
